Summary Note:
Eleonora Ginevra Esposito and the RM are childhood friends, having attended the same schools and shared many life experiences. Their enduring friendship has laid a solid foundation for their business relationship.
Eleonora Ginevra Esposito is a 49 year old Investment Director from Italy.
She was impressed by Julius Baer's global presence and expertise in private banking, leading to the decision to join.
Family Background: Eleonora Ginevra Esposito is currently single. She does not have any children.
Education Background:
Eleonora graduated from Istituto Tecnico Commerciale Statale Luigi Einaudi Torino in 1995.
Eleonora graduated from Ca' Foscari University of Venice in 2000, completing her higher education.
Occupation History:
Eleonora Ginevra Esposito is a 49 year old and comes from Italy.
At Clessidra SGR S.p.A., Eleonora Ginevra Esposito held the position of Analyst from 2000 to 2004, developing essential skills in the field.
Her subsequent role was as a Associate at Fondo Italiano d'Investimento SGR S.p.A., where she continued to grow professionally from 2006 to 2008.
At Syntegra SGR S.p.A., she worked as a Investment Director from 2009 till now, focusing on strategic initiatives and team collaboration.
Wealth Summary:
During her work, she focused on financial growth, making diverse investments and ultimately saving 350000 EUR.
She has invested in several rental properties across various locations, generating additional income. The properties are valued at 2390000 EUR.


In addition to her career success, she also received an inheritance of 6020000 EUR from her late father, a renowned Corporate Lawyer, in 2012.
Client Summary: In summary, Eleonora has demonstrated a strong work ethic and financial acumen, positioning them well for the future.
